patthana1.2:49.1_6: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṁ. Khandhā vatthuṁ vippayuttapaccayā.

patthana1.2:714.1_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.2:714.1_1: khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana1.2:714.1_2: paccayo—kusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo
patthana1.2:714.1_3: kusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—kusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.2:715.1_0: Akusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—akusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.2:715.1_1: khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Akusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana1.2:715.1_2: paccayo—akusalā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Akusalo dhammo
patthana1.2:715.1_3: akusalassa ca abyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—akusalā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.2:716.1_0: Abyākato dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—vipākābyākatā kiriyābyākatā
patthana1.2:716.1_1: hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo;
patthana1.2:716.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ
patthana1.2:717.1_0: Kusalo dhammo kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā
patthana1.2:717.1_1: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā
patthana1.2:717.1_2: jhānaṁ paccavekkhati, sekkhā gotrabhuṁ paccavekkhanti, vodānaṁ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā
patthana1.2:717.1_3: maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, sekkhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṁ aniccato
patthana1.2:717.1_4: dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena kusalacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti.
patthana1.2:717.1_6: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa,
patthana1.2:718.1_0: Kusalo dhammo akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā
patthana1.2:718.1_1: uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ assādeti abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.2:718.1_2: uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati. Pubbe
patthana1.2:718.1_3: suciṇṇāni assādeti abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā
patthana1.2:718.1_4: uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati. Jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ assādeti
patthana1.2:718.1_5: abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati,
patthana1.2:718.1_6: uddhaccaṁ uppajjati. Jhāne parihīne vippaṭisārissa domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.2:719.1_0: Kusalo dhammo abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—arahā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā

patthana1.2:877.1_2: uddhaccaṁ uppajjati, domanassaṁ uppajjati. Sotaṁ …pe… ghānaṁ …pe… jivhaṁ …pe… kāyaṁ
patthana1.2:877.1_3: …pe… rūpe …pe… sadde …pe… gandhe …pe… rase …pe… phoṭṭhabbe …pe… vatthuṁ assādeti,
patthana1.2:877.1_4: abhinandati; taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe… domanassaṁ uppajjati. Vatthu akusalānaṁ
patthana1.2:878.1_0: Kusalo ca abyākato ca dhammā kusalassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,

patthana1.2:878.1_2: paccayo …pe… dve khandhā ca vatthu ca dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.2:1574.1: Natthipaccayā nahetuyā satta …pe… vigatapaccayā nahetuyā satta …pe…. (Natthipaccayampi vigatapaccayampi anantarapaccayasadisaṁ.)
